price: Badii ifa bahaafi dhokataa isaas dhiisaa. Dhugumatti, isaannan cubbuu hojjatan waan kijiba uumaniif fuuldura galata galfamu (ni adabamu).
arabic: وَذَرُواْ ظَٰهِرَ ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَبَاطِنَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكۡسِبُونَ ٱلۡإِثۡمَ سَيُجۡزَوۡنَ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَقۡتَرِفُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wadharū ẓāhira al-ith'mi wabāṭinahu inna alladhīna yaksibūna al-ith'ma sayuj'zawna bimā kānū yaqtarifūna
